alert.note: Alert for Clay; De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 1:57PM CDT until May 06 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... South central Clay County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern White County in Middle Tennessee... Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Baxter to 7 miles east of Smithville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Gainesboro, Algood, Baxter, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park and Cummins Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 272 and 293. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; White
